title: Ticket #1468: DAGMan reads DAX format
description:
LIGO has expressed interest in having DAGMan read DAX files (so they can express all of their workflows in the DAX format).

It's not totally clear at this point whether we want to have DAGMan read DAX files, or have Pegasus support a simpler format that can be used without the data, transformation, and site catalogs.

(Note: this is from condor-support #4015. I'm creating this ticket in the process of resolving old support RUSTs.)
remarks:
2010-Jul-16 12:48:37 by wenger:
We need some clarification here, but my understanding is that LIGO wants several things: 1) Be able to define a DAX that doesn't reference a site catalog, data catalog, and transformation catalog. 2) Run the DAX with a single command, rather than pegasus-plan + pegasus-run.

2012-Mar-09 00:32:06 by pfc:
Duncan says this, "can probably be closed, as we've converged to a solution with the Pegasus team."
